overview: A static healthcare landing page with navigation, hero, introduction, call-to-action, and footer sections. Includes accessibility features, theme toggle, and navigation links to other pages.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and links
Hero section with heading and SVG illustration
Introduction section with three feature cards
Call-to-action section with service and contact buttons
Footer with quick links and contact info
interactions: Click theme toggle to switch dark/light mode
Click navigation links to navigate between pages
Click CTA buttons to go to More Info or Contact pages
Click back-to-top button to scroll to top
Skip to content link focuses main content
data_flow: Static HTML content rendered directly in browser
Theme toggle likely updates CSS variables or body class via main.js
Navigation and CTA links trigger full page reloads to other static routes
Back-to-top button visibility toggled based on scroll position
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation, theme toggle, and hero image
Semantic headings and landmarks (header, main, footer)
Color contrast and aria-pressed state for theme toggle
analytics: Potential click tracking on theme toggle, CTA buttons, and navigation links
Scroll or visibility tracking for back-to-top button
test_ideas: Validate navbar links navigate to correct routes
Check theme toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
Confirm back-to-top button appears after scrolling and scrolls to top when clicked
Validate all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Check presence of meta description and correct title
Verify footer contact links (tel/mailto) open appropriate handlers
